com.assignment2.dos.smarterHomes

Class DatabaseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.assignment2.dos.smarterHomes.DatabaseHandler

  • public class DatabaseHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    DataBaseHandler acts a client for the gateway and communicates with the Database, thus acting as a bridge for the database and the gateway

        private java.lang.String handleGatewayMessage(java.lang.String message,

        handleGatewayMessage method takes the message and the component as arguments and replies back the the response based on the query. The message which is the query may be to get the history or the status for all or a particular component
